about_the_game:
Magic stones will allow you to enter the Sultan's treasury and see all of his untold treasures. An unusual version of the gameplay of the game "three in a row" will surprise the fan of the genre, because here you need to break the combo of gems yourself, trying to spend as few moves on it as possible and fulfill the goal of the level. Even a sophisticated player will have a hard time - the difficulty of the game will increase with each level. Will you cope with all the tasks and complete all the levels?

Features:
- Unusual gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
detailed_description:
Magic stones will allow you to enter the Sultan's treasury and see all of his untold treasures. An unusual version of the gameplay of the game "three in a row" will surprise the fan of the genre, because here you need to break the combo of gems yourself, trying to spend as few moves on it as possible and fulfill the goal of the level. Even a sophisticated player will have a hard time - the difficulty of the game will increase with each level. Will you cope with all the tasks and complete all the levels?

Features:
- Unusual gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Achievements
- Nice soundtrack
name: Magic gems

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: Magic gems game is an unusual game for fans of the genre "three in a row", in which you have to break a combo of gems on your own to complete the level.
